channel.title: Npcdrop help
channel.description: I was working on chaos ele drops but when I run server I get this error. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2095) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:556) at server.main(server.java:118) [/code] Here is the codes of what I was adding. [code]//chaos elemental npcdrop = 3200 15700 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15701 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15702 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15703 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15704 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15610 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15611 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15350 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 15600 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 15510 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 15604 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15606 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15607 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15601 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15603 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15602 1 5 [/code]

item.title: Npcdrop help
item.dc:creator: @rafikd rafikd
item.description:
@rafikd wrote:

open npcHandler.java and search for

public double[][] drops = new double

you will find:

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][**];

the “**” is your number and have to increase that number so

e.g if yours is looking like:

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][15];

change it too maybe:

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][35];

compile, run and if you still get the error then try increase the number more good luck

Rafikd

Read full topic

@deathschaos9 wrote:

First off, delete that and see if it starts working, as that may not be the problem.

item.title: Npcdrop help
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

I was working on chaos ele drops but when I run server I get this error.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2095) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:556) at server.main(server.java:118)
Here is the codes of what I was adding.

//chaos elemental npcdrop = 3200 15700 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15701 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15702 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15703 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15704 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15610 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15611 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15350 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 15600 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 15510 1 1 npcdrop = 3200 15604 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15606 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15607 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15601 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15603 1 5 npcdrop = 3200 15602 1 5
